title: Someone send me in priv that he boost and a link. Worried or not?
body:
Someone send me friend request and sent me in priv something like:
"I was the one carried last game. I think you might be interested, it's super cheap atm" and send a link to website. Didn't open it of course but now I can't see him in my friend list or in recent met. Didn't make screenshot and closed that chat. I also don't see him in any of my recent games. Should I be worried? His nick started with Sierra but don't remember all...

replies.body: I get that a lot as of late. I ignore it. Never cheated and no need to. It destroys the game.  But what I don't understand is how they found me.  They say they played a recent game with me but when I look up recent match history I don't see there names.

If you didn't click the link, there's nothing to worry about. It sounds like they added you temporarily to advertise a boosting service, then removed you from their friends list. 

Definitely be wary of links to strange sites in the future, but good on ya for being cautious.
